"Now, Go to Training":
"Hearing people's feedback about the new
training program has given me an idea for
the celebration event.
But I need your help to be certain!
Could you start the training program, go
through those past battles and tell me
how you feel about it?
※Clear on Normal+, A rank or higher
※Trigger Quests do not count.
※Can't accept after July 24th 11:00 JST"
